snippet: Although the new phone is virtually indistinguishable from its predecessor on the outside, the company says the iPhone 4S is packed with better technical innards, including a more advanced camera.
lead_paragraph: Although the new phone is virtually indistinguishable from its predecessor on the outside, the company says the iPhone 4S is packed with better technical innards, including a more advanced camera.

headline.main: IPhone Gets Its Upgrade, All Under the Hood
headline.print_headline: IPhone Gets Its Upgrade, All Under the Hood
headline.seo: IPhone 4S Gets More Power, a Better Camera and Siri
